abstract.text: Review how your app uses audio session inputs.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

metadata.title: Audio Input Route and Duration and Call Mode

inlineContent.text: The data in this report contains aggregate information about route, duration, and call mode for input audio in your app. It bins duration into increasing bin sizes to keep resolution on shorter audio sessions. It also only reports input port and call mode for relevant audio sessions.
Platforms: iOS, iPadOS.  For more information about iOS and iPadOS, see the Platforms section in
History: On request, data is available beginning with iOS 17.4 and iPadOS 17.4.

Completeness: Data from devices that contribute to this report can arrive as late as 8 days after the date it generates on device. You can download recent data daily, but it might be incomplete, and data updates incrementally daily, until all late-arriving events are available.
Includes data from users who have opted to share their data with Apple and developers.
Individual rows will only appear if they have a value of 5 or more.
Data Context: You can analyze your data with additional context by comparing it with the data in the

report, which provides a count of unique devices that use your app on a specific day. For example, if your app performed an action detailed in this report on 10 unique devices on a specific day, and the App Sessions Context report shows there were 100 unique devices running your app that day, then you can approximate that 10% of the devices running your app performed that action.
Number of times the event occurred
Country or region in which the event occurred
OS version on the device on which the event occurred
Type of device on which the event occurred
Build of device on which event occurred
Voice-processing input port that the app uses for relevant audio sessions
Type of voice processing call for relevant sessions
